message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it! However, I'm looking to spend closer to $100 for this product.  Would you be willing to do $105?
I understand you're looking to spend $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm not willing to go below that price.
